sentences.en: Article 47 may only be used in accordance with international law.
sentences.cn: 第47条只能按照国际法来施行。

sentences.en: Collecting banks are to advise fate in accordance with the following rules.
sentences.cn: 代收行应按照下列规则通知托收结果.

sentences.en: He acted in accordance with his beliefs.
sentences.cn: 他按照自己的信念行事.

sentences.en: He was always neatly and quietly dressed in accordance with his age and station.
sentences.cn: 他衣着整洁素雅,合乎他的年龄和身份.

sentences.en: I am in accordance with him in this matter.
sentences.cn: 在这件事情上我同他是一致的。

sentences.en: If so you will report for duty in accordance with the instructions you have received.
sentences.cn: 那么你们将根据收到的指示报到.

sentences.en: If your pursuit of personal career and ideal are in accordance with ours, if you are seeking for the pleasure from sharing the same ambitions, please join us!
sentences.cn: 如果您想谋求个人事业、理想与公司的事业和理想高度一致，如果您追求的是志同道合的工作愉悦，请加入我们！

sentences.en: In accordance to your request, I am sending you sample pages of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 根据你的要求, 现寄上词典的样张.

sentences.en: It is an obvious truism that people act in accordance with their motives.
sentences.cn: 人人都按自己的动机行事是不言而喻的.

sentences.en: IT organizations working in an environment with compliance requirements must to be able to document that they have designed, implemented, and tested the application in accordance with these standards.
sentences.cn: 工作在有法规遵循要求的环境中的IT组织必须能够证明他们已经计划、执行，并测试了这个应用软件与这些标准是保持一致的。

sentences.en: One's opinion tends to differ in accordance with one's standpoint.
sentences.cn: 不同的立场势必形成不同的见解.

sentences.en: She was dismissed in accordance with the company's usual displinary procedures.
sentences.cn: 按照公司一般纪律程序,她被解雇了.

sentences.en: The actions of individuals and groups are here understood being in accordance with their aims.
sentences.cn: 在这里,个人或集团的行为被理解为符合于他们的目的.

sentences.en: The arrows are directed in accordance with the previously explained rules.
sentences.cn: 根据前面所说的规律定出了箭头的方向.

sentences.en: The scheme has been revised in accordance with the opinions of the masses.
sentences.cn: 方案已按照群众意见修改了.

sentences.en: This indulgence was in accordance with the general policy of the redmen.
sentences.cn: 这种宽宏大量的气度,是红种人一贯使用的策略.

sentences.en: This phrasal implied meaning in accordance with the Chinese language procrustean method similar is demand/ the not reasonable request handles affairs according to same standard.
sentences.cn: 这个成语的寓意和汉语削足适履一样是强求一致/不合理的要求按照同一标准办事。

sentences.en: Veritable truth is not in accordance with an external.
sentences.cn: 可证实的真理并不依照外在的东西.

sentences.en: We assure you that the quality of our goods will be in accordance with that of the samples.
sentences.cn: 我们向你方保证，我们货物的质量一定与样品的质量一致。

sentences.en: We should make decisions in accordance with specific conditions.
sentences.cn: 我们应当根据具体情况做出决定.

trans.tran_cn: 依照，依据（常用in accordance with），一致
trans.tran_en: according to a rule, system etc
